Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Yǐ wúhuāguǒ hé zǐ dūn guǒ méngshì
yǐ zhè gè ānníng de chéngshì méngshì
wǒ què yǐ bǎ rén zàochéng jùyǒu zuìměi de xíngtài
ránhòu wǒ shǐ tā biàn chéng zuì bēiliè de
dàn xìndào érqiě xíngshàn zhě, jiāng shòu bùduàn de bàochóu
Cǐhòu, nǐ zěnme hái fǒurèn bàoyìng ne
nándào zhēnzhǔ bùshì zuì gōngzhèng de pànjué zhě ma
